subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Denver Broncos extended the contract of John Elway, which was set to expire after the 2014 season, through 2017 and added general manager to his title of executive vice president.
snippet: The Denver Broncos extended the contract of John Elway, which was set to expire after the 2014 season, through 2017 and added general manager to his title of executive vice president.
